items.title: Author asks ChatGPT for advice on her book about tech — here's what it said
items.summary: Author Vauhini Vara sought advice from ChatGPT for her book about tech, 'Searches: Selfhood in the Digital Age,' exploring the duality of tech in helping and exploiting us. Through analyzing the AI feedback, Vara delved into the abilities, shortcomings, and biases of the chatbot.

items.title: Pharma Companies Pour Billions Into US Manufacturing To Avoid Tariffs
items.summary: Pharma companies are investing billions in US manufacturing to avoid tariffs, as the industry is a target for tariffs by the Trump administration in order to protect US interests.

items.title: Trump Admin Unveils AI Strategy To Maintain US Dominance
items.summary: Trump Admin unveils AI strategy to maintain US dominance in the AI field and boost big tech's race to stay ahead of China.

items.title: It Can't Do That
items.summary: AI is often misunderstood as having abilities it does not actually possess, causing frustration and confusion among users and developers.

items.title: Trump's AI plan eases data center rules, strips federal DEI guidelines
items.summary: Trump's AI plan focuses on easing data center rules and removing federal DEI guidelines to support artificial intelligence research and development in the US.

items.summary: White House unveils America's AI Action Plan aimed at removing barriers to American leadership in AI and ushering in a new golden age of human flourishing.

items.summary: Google posts $96B in Q2 revenue, fueled by AI investments for content creation, chatbots, and web search.

items.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman warns of an impending AI fraud crisis, especially towards financial institutions using voice authentication.

items.title: Oakley Meta HSTN fixes the biggest problem with Ray-Ban Meta Smart Glasses, and I couldn't be happier about it
items.summary: Meta claims Oakley Meta HSTN smart glasses have twice the battery life of Ray-Ban Meta Smart Glasses, addressing a major issue with the latter. The battery life claim is tested to verify its accuracy.

items.title: Camarda hat-trick, Pisa shine, Udinese flop in friendlies
items.summary: Serie A teams continue with friendlies to prepare for the upcoming season, with some teams shining and others struggling. The teams are getting ready for either the Coppa Italia or their first league match.

items.summary: Mark Cuban and Sam Altman are warning about disappearing jobs due to AI and emphasize the need to learn AI as it is poised to radically change the office environment.

items.title: How this Toronto airport is using AI to help reduce garbage waste
items.summary: A Toronto airport is using artificial intelligence to help reduce garbage waste and teach people about recycling by launching Oscar Sort recycling stations.

items.title: Sam Altman is worried some young people have an 'emotional over-reliance' on ChatGPT when making decisions

items.title: 18-year-old rising freshman is trying to break his AI habit because a friend used ChatGPT to dump someone
items.summary: An 18-year-old is trying to break his AI habit after a friend used ChatGPT to dump someone, highlighting ethical concerns with AI usage among teenagers. Another high school student is relying on ChatGPT for guidance on various topics, showcasing the potential impact of AI on young users.

items.title: Businesses in the age of AI have to rethink how they manage talent—’You protect the worker…you don’t protect the job itself’
items.summary: Businesses in the age of AI are rethinking talent management as technology transforms the job market. One in 10 people hired last year were for jobs that didn't exist 20 years ago, according to a LinkedIn report.

items.title: K-Pop Star Jisoo Stars In New Self-Portrait Campaign, Talks Filming Against Green Screen & Seeing Final Results
items.summary: K-Pop Star Jisoo stars in new Self-Portrait campaign, discussing filming against green screen and seeing final results. She has been the face of the brand since early 2024, becoming the first musician to front a campaign for Self-Portrait.

items.title: Millennials are officially a majority of managers—so get ready for a combination of burnout, buddy vibes, and boundary issues
items.summary: Millennials as majority of managers bring challenges related to burnout, buddy vibes, and boundary issues. Emotional intelligence is now expected of managers, leaving millennial managers feeling stuck between a rock and a hard place.

items.title: Show HN: Open-Source AI Analyst in Slack (LLM and Python, Self-Hosted)
items.summary: A new open-source AI analyst in Slack has been developed using LLM and Python, allowing users to receive AI-generated summaries and analysis directly in their Slack workspace. The tool is self-hosted and can be customized to meet individual needs.

items.title: Sonos Locks In New CEO After Months of Uncertainty
items.summary: Tom Conrad becomes the new CEO of Sonos after serving as interim chief since January 2025, with the role now made permanent. He will also continue to be on Sonos' board of directors.

items.summary: Reliance on AI is causing glitches at the FDA, hindering drug approvals and streamlining. The use of AI in this context raises ethical concerns about the potential risks and consequences of automation in critical decision-making processes.
